name: A Certain Smelly Railgun
description:
Story:
Once upon a time in premodern age, a city was under frequently invasion by monsters.  People hide away and expect someone to save them. Those volunteers defended the city are not as strong as monsters, but smart. Player's act as one of them, who is famously about take no bath for years. Everyone hate him because of smelly, so the monsters are surely hate him too. He throws poo, pants, onion and something smelly to make the monster feel sad. He enjoy these battles  because enemies are legal to beat.

Control

Move: WSADRun: ShiftJump: Spacerotate: mouseThrow: left clickSelect items: right click

How to Play

running and jumping over the roofs, find enemies and throw something smelly to them!

Future Development
~ Add more levels
~ create different bosses for different level, write complex AI for them.
~ complete the big city, players are able to play in different areas of a big city (such as underground tunnels, hillside castles, country side farms etc)
~ create different types of enemies, items to throw
~ make original accesses, such as models, pics and SFX
